outputs.name: data
outputs.description: A list of Data Collections that have been filtered by the _pattern.

inputs.name: _data
inputs.description:
A Data Collection or list of aligned Data Collections to be filtered
by a pattern.

inputs.name: _pattern
inputs.description:
A list of True/False values. Typically, list has a length matching
the length of the Data Collection(s)'s values. However, it can also
be a pattern to be repeated over the Data Collection(s)'s values.

name: LB Apply Pattern
description:
Filter a data collection or list of data collections by a pattern of True/False
values. True values will be kept while False values will be filtered out.
-
